snippet: Tina Charles scored 14 of her 18 points in the second half to lead the Connecticut Sun to a 76-64 home win over the Indiana Fever in the opener of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.
abstract: Connecticut Sun defeats Indiana Fever, 76-64, in WNBA Eastern Conference finals opener.
lead_paragraph: Tina Charles scored 14 of her 18 points in the second half to lead the Connecticut Sun to a 76-64 home win over the Indiana Fever in the opener of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.

headline.seo: Connecticut Wins W.N.B.A. Conference Final Opener
